Title: Sleeveless Beaded Evening Dress with Cut Out Back

----

Sku: J741

----

Price: 

----

Saleprice: 

----

Bulkdiscount: 0

Sizes: 10, 4, 8, 6

----

Colors: off-white, fuchsia

----

Category: evening

----

Featured-image: J741-off-white-sleeveless-beaded-evening-dress-with-cut-out-back_p.jpg

----

Description: This floor length gown flows with grace and movement. The empire waistline is adorned with simple pleating. The bodice is sheer with beading creating floral patterns around the bust and continuing to the back and trimming the top of the skirt. The back is cutout with a circular shape. This gown is fresh and fun.
